casebody.data:
NOONSOB
v.
STATE of NC 131P16-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Somchoi Noonsab, For Noonsab, Somchoi.

Somchoi Noorsob, For Noorsob, Somchoi.

N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for the State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of December 2017 by Defendant to Arrest Judgment:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
